p: There is a large global trial supported by the WHO, SOLIDARITY, to research available therapies for Covid-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir and ritonavir, and lopinavir + ritonavir + interferon-beta. There is widespread interest to CP from recovered Covid-19 patients as treatment. The United States Food and Drug Administration (U.S. FDA) has published guidelines for investigating CP for the treatment of COVID-19 [ 8].
